recipes.title: Slowcooked Curry
recipes.summary: A very tasty curry slowcooked all day
recipes.contents:
Ingredients

  • 1 tbsp sunflower oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 3 garlic cloves
  • 1 tsp ground cumin
  • 1 tsp ground coriander
  • 1 1/2 tbsp garam masala
  • 1 - 3 tsp hot paprika
  • 2 tbsp tomato puree
  • 2 1/2 cm fresh root ginger, peeled and grated
  • 400g tin chopped tomatos
  • 200ml coconut milk
  • 1tsp caster sugar
  • 650g chicken fillets
  • handful fresh coriander leaves

Instructions

Bang it all in the slow cooker

recipes.title: Diced steak stir-fry
recipes.summary: Dices steak done in a stir-fry style
recipes.contents:
Ingredients

  • 500g diced steak
  • pack of stir-fry veg
  • ginger
  • 1 tbsp white rice vineger
  • 1 tbsp honey
  • mushrooms
  • 3 garlic cloves
  • 1 tbsp soy sauce

Optional Ingredients

  • chillies
  • sesame seeds
  • peppers

Instructions

  1. Prepare the mushrooms, ginger and garlic cloves

  2. Start cooking the diced steak

  3. Add in the veg

  4. Add in the rest of the ingredients to make the sauce
